name: Orbing Around
description:
Hi! This is my entry for Weekly Game Jam #169. It doesn't really fit the Treasure Hunt theme because I couldn't really think of an idea... But I you do collect coins so that's my excuse :D

It's inspired by On the Ball from 1992 (aka Cameltry)

Used SFX from:
https://obsydianx.itch.io/interface-sfx-pack-1
https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
